addFilter

public void addFilter(java.lang.String uniqueIdentifier,
                      GnMoodgridFilterListType elistType,
                      java.lang.String strValueId,
                      GnMoodgridFilterConditionType eConditionType)
               throws GnException
Adds a filter to the presentation for the inclusion of a list type to include or exclude from the recommendations.

Parameters:
uniqueIdentifier - [in] : unique identifier for the presentation representing this filter.
elistType - [in] : list type
strValueId - [in] : list value that is to be operated upon.
eConditionType - [in]: filter condition
Throws:
GnException

findRecommendations

public GnMoodgridResult findRecommendations(GnMoodgridProvider provider,
                                            GnMoodgridDataPoint position)
                                     throws GnException
Generates recommendations for a given mood data point and provider. The reccomentations are represented by a GnMoodgridResult.

Parameters:
provider - [in] : moodgrid provider that the results must come from.
position - [in] : data point that represents the mood for which reccomendation are requested.
Returns:
GnMoodgridResult
Throws:
GnException

findRecommendationsEstimate

public long findRecommendationsEstimate(GnMoodgridProvider provider,
                                        GnMoodgridDataPoint position)
                                 throws GnException
Generates a recommendations estimate for a given mood data point and provider. The estimate is dependent on the provider. Use this functionality for creating a heat map of all the moods supported in the presentation.

Parameters:
provider - [in] :moodgrid provider that the estimate must come from.
position - [in] : data point that represents the mood for which the estimate is requested.
Returns:
count representing the estimate.
Throws:
GnException
